settings.heading: Sērene® is [skincare] and [self-care] for a life lived in motion. Founded in Los Angeles, we are built on and from a connection to the natural world.

settings.description: We combine active ingredients from the sea and mountains with skin science and intoxicating fragrances, for a sensorial experience that soothes and restores.

settings.heading: We draw on a deep understanding of the elements—their effects on the skin and body—a desire to create beautiful products in harmony with nature and a celebration of the all-consuming power of scent.

settings.description: “Hello, I’m Audrey H. Lindsey, founder and CEO of Sērene®. Having dealt with sensitive skin throughout my adult life, I understand the challenges it brings. After over 15 years of experience in the beauty industry, I grew increasingly frustrated with clinical skincare brands that often lacked effectiveness or appeal for individuals like me with chronic eczema. This inspired me to create a brand that committed to delivering accessible, irritant-free, high-performance skincare products designed for all skin types, with special care for sensitive skin.”

settings.heading: My personal journey to healthier skin inspired the creation of Sērene®, a brand committed to delivering products that truly work while being accessible to everyone. At Sērene®, we focus on science-driven formulations to demystify skincare and simplify your routine. Our goal is to provide you with go-to essentials—whether they sit on your bathroom shelf or travel with you—that improve your skin over time, keeping it nourished, hydrated, and glowing.

settings.description: Advanced formula soothes and protects the skin from sun exposure, delivering a fresh and comfortable feeling.

settings.heading: Our Core Values
settings.description: It was essential for us to create a business rooted in values. We stand firmly for: Simplicity, Affordability, Authenticity, Quality, and Transparency.

settings.heading: Science-driven skincare products
settings.description: Crafted in collaboration with award-winning dermatologists, chemists, and industry experts, our skin barrier-focused formulas deliver visible results—immediately and for years to come

settings.heading: Minimal footprint philosophy
settings.description: From limited releases to consciously-sourced ingredients we are committed to mindful skincare. Vegan. Cruelty Free. Gluten Free. Fragrance Free.

settings.heading: Each product is a careful blend of antioxidant and nutrient rich ingredients—including seaweed, spirulina, kelp–created to protect, cleanse, support and recover.
Snail Mucin
settings.description: Hydrates, repairs, and soothes the skin while promoting collagen production for a glowing complexion.

settings.heading: Peptides
settings.description: Active amino acids that visibly firm, plump skin, and minimize the appearance of fine lines.

settings.heading: Shea Butter
settings.description: Hydrates and moisturizes with essential fatty acids, including vitamins E, D, A, and allantoin.

settings.heading: Cupuaçu
settings.description: Nourishes the skin, minimizes pores, and improves overall skin texture and tone.

settings.heading: Niacinamide
settings.description: Helps maintain skin elasticity and enhances suppleness for deep hydration and smoothness.

settings.heading: What is PCR Packaging?
settings.description: At Sērene®, we believe in giving materials a second life. PCR (Post-Consumer Resin) packaging is made from recycled plastics that were once everyday items like bottles or containers. By reclaiming and repurposing these materials, we’re not only reducing waste but also taking meaningful steps toward a more sustainable future.

settings.heading: Why We Chose PCR
settings.description: Sustainability is at the heart of everything we do. That’s why all of our plastic product packaging is crafted with at least 50% PCR (post-consumer resin). This choice helps divert plastic waste from landfills and oceans while lowering the demand for new, virgin plastic. It also reduces the environmental burden on you, the end-user, by simplifying the journey of recyclable materials.

settings.heading: Sērene® and a Greener Future
settings.description: Every purchase you make with Sērene® supports a greener planet. By integrating PCR packaging into our products, we’re able to create eco-conscious beauty solutions without compromising on quality or functionality. Together, we can make small, impactful choices that lead to a cleaner, more sustainable world—one product at a time.
